name: Ker Ys - UE4 Jam
description:
Made in one week for the Epic MegaJam

You're lost into the sunken city, reach your throne near the surface. Don't let the monsters take your light away, steal their light by defeating them.

Gamepad control

  • Movement : Left stick
  • Camera : Right stick
  • Grapple hook : B
  • Simple attack : X
  • Dash : A
  • Switch target : LB / RT
  • Lock / Unlock enemies : Left joystick button

Keyboard control

  • Movement : WASD / ZQSD
  • Camera : Mouse
  • Grapple hook : Right click
  • Simple attack : Left click
  • Dash : Spacebar
  • Switch target : Mouse wheel
  • Unlock / Lock enemies : Alt
Team:
  • Damien Crechet : AI Programmer
  • Robin Cugniet : Sound Designer
  • Thomas Luke Garcia : Environnement Artist
  • Thomas Giro : Gameplay Programmer
  • Lise Sourlier : Character Artist
